zh_CN.DialogText: 我们一起来到了一个老工人的房间

en_US.DialogText: We came to an old worker's room together

zh_CN.DialogText: 你们这是来让我修什么东西的吗？

en_US.DialogText: Are you here for me to fix something?

zh_CN.DialogText: 是我想要重建我的小屋子，但是可能只有两个人不太行

en_US.DialogText: Yes, I want to rebuild my little house, but maybe only two people are not very good

zh_CN.DialogText: 所以我想找你一起帮个忙

en_US.DialogText: So I want to ask you for a favor

zh_CN.DialogText: 我是很乐意帮这个忙的，但是...我现在手上只有一套工具，其他的什么都没有

en_US.DialogText: I'd love to help, but Now I have only one set of tools in my hand and nothing else

zh_CN.DialogText: 这样的话，我们也没有其他人可以找了啊...

en_US.DialogText: In that case, we don't have anyone else to find

zh_CN.DialogText: 我突然有一个主意，你们年轻的幸存者不是天天出去收集能用的材料吗？

en_US.DialogText: I suddenly had an idea. Don't you young survivors go out every day to collect usable materials?

zh_CN.DialogText: 如果我们把收集的东西共享起来，各取所需，说不动就能解决有材料没人，有人没材料的困境了

en_US.DialogText: If we share the collected things, take what we need and say nothing, we can solve the dilemma of no one with materials and no one with materials

zh_CN.DialogText: 就这样，我去组织组织大家讨论讨论，过几天我来帮你修房子吧。

en_US.DialogText: That's it. I'll organize a discussion. I'll help you repair the house in a few days.
